item.title: The Pythonista’s Guide to the OWASP Top 10
item.description: If you’re like many developers or IT professionals, you may have mixed feelings about these lists. I get it. On one hand, you know they’re important for keeping your applications and systems secure. On the other hand, they can be overwhelming, dry, and difficult to implement. But what if I told you that security checklists don’t have to be that way? What if I showed you how to approach these lists in a whole new light, and make easy work of the items on them?

item.title: 5 Tools to Automate SBOM Creation
item.description: If you search for “How to Automate SBOM Creation” you’ll find a huge number of results. As a software engineer, I personally get frustrated by those results almost instantly. Instead of telling me how to automate the creation of my SBOM, most of them spend half the article telling me why I should automate my SBOM creation. I want to do this a bit differently by focusing just on tools you can actually use in your CI pipeline for free right now.

item.title: What the OpenSSL Vulnerabilities Are…and Aren't
item.description: In this article, we won’t be going into detail about how the vulnerability came to be or even how to patch it (in short: upgrade to the latest). Instead, we’ll be taking a quick look at what an exploit against these two new issues could be able to do- and compare it to two other common dependency exploits. Read More
